_source.text: [ 54 ] No other atypical studied ( risperidone , quetiapine , and ziprasidone ) did better than the typical perphenazine on the measures used, nor did they produce fewer adverse effects than the typical antipsychotic perphenazine, although more patients discontinued perphenazine owing to extrapyramidal effects compared to the atypical agents (8% vs. 2% to 4%).

text: [ 54 ] No other atypical studied ( risperidone , quetiapine , and **ziprasidone** ) did **better** **than** the
